edu.nps.moves.math

Class Quaternion2

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.nps.moves.math.Quaternion2

  • public class Quaternion2
extends java.lang.Object
    The Quaternion2 class executes quaternion operations.
    Version:
    1.0 13 Dec 98 DIS VRML - OpenGl +---------->x ^y /| | / | | / | ======> | y | +-------------->x z / / / z
    Author:
    Ildeniz Duman
